Detailed Description

template<class HEAP = malloc_heap>
class cds::memory::michael::page_allocator< HEAP >

Page heap based on HEAP.

Page heap can allocate memory by page-sized block only. HEAP may be any heap that provides interface like malloc_heap.

This class is one of available implementation of opt::page_heap option.
